TopicTitle: [0.25] [Heavily Modded] Reverting flight causes KSP to freeze

Articles.Content:
Whenever I revert a flight, KSP either freezes up of gives me a really weird gray screen and I have to restart.

For reference, here's everything in my GameData folder:

AnimatedDecouplers

AutoAsparagus

CrossFeedEnabler

KerbonTech (Apollo style command module)

Klockeed Martian Special Parts

Lionhead Aerospace, Inc. (Circular Solar Panels)

MechJeb 2

Mechjeb Embedded Universally

ModuleManager 2.5.1

NearFuturePropulsion

NearFutureSolar

NearFutureSpacecraftParts

ProceduralFairings

ProceduralParts

RealChute

SDHI Service Module System

RealChute\

Have you deleted the stock parachutes config for RealChute? That is is RealChute/Module Manager; for some reason, having RealChute functionality enabled on stock chutes causes major loading errors.

Otherwise, do try narrowing down which mod or mod combination is responsible.
Huh? how do I do that? I'm a Noob when it comes to configs and related stuff. You'll have to give me step-by step instructions

Huh? how do I do that? I'm a Noob when it comes to configs and related stuff. You'll have to give me step-by step instructions

Delete them one by one and figure out when it stops breaking.

If you don't want to affect your main game, make a copy of your KSP folder (literally ctrl-C ctrl-V), and change mods/run the executable from there.

Better help would be to give us your output_log.txt file.

This thread will help show you how to find it and what to post for you can get help. Usually all it takes is someone reading your Output_log.txt file to figure it out.
